ygData.subject: Re: Bowmaking components
ygData.msgSnippet: Kyle Arrowsmith definetly sells them, but no one at the Rangers guild in kithicor woods does, In East Karana the store that is near the wood bridge sells them
ygData.messageBody:
Kyle Arrowsmith definetly sells them, but no one at the Rangers guild in
kithicor woods does, In East Karana the store that is near the wood bridge
sells them also and they are sold in the Jaggered Pine Treefolk house in
Surefall.

Aethen of Surefall
-----Original Message-----
From: NiamiSt@... <NiamiSt@...>
To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, 16 October 1999 1:03
Subject: [EQ_Fletchers] Bowmaking components


>From: NiamiSt@...
>
>In a message dated 10/15/99 6:51:11 AM Eastern Daylight Time, Tim Polsfoot
><polsfoot@...> writes:
>
>> Now can anyone tell me where to find components to make bows close East
>> Commons or Freeport?
>>
>
>There aren't any very close, unless you're safe wandering through Feerrott.
>
>Bowmaking supplies are found in Feerrott, Kelethin, Surefall and South
Karana.
>
>The Trade Supplies page at www.eqtraders.com has more details.
>
>~Niami DenMother
>
>
